edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthenticationInit

edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthenticationInit Class Reference

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static void init (ServletContext context)

Detailed Description

AuthenticationInit is a class containing a static init() function that loads Authentication Methods, Applications, and Permitted Systems from the various XML files that define them.

Author:
Kenneth Sharp
Version:
3.0 (released September 15, 2005)

Member Function Documentation

init is a static fucntion that reads the XML files containing Authentication methods, permitted applications and permitted systems.
